title: LA-23-09: Availability of Exemptions in 5 C.F.R. Part 2640 When an Agency Waives its Prohibited Holding Rule
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/E7FBA856BDDC9793852589E4004848AD/$FILE/LA-23-09 Availability of Exemptions in 5 C.F.R. Part 2640 When an Agency Waives its Prohibited Holding Rule.pdf?open
summary: This Legal Advisory provides guidance regarding the availability of the exemptions found at 5 C.F.R. part 2640, subpart B, when an agency waives its prohibited holding rule.
